price: 17. Ceux qui ont trouvé la bonne voie, (Allah) les guidera encore et leur accordera la piété (qui leur est due).
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ زَادَهُمۡ هُدٗى وَءَاتَىٰهُمۡ تَقۡوَىٰهُمۡ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ih'tadaw zādahum hudan waātāhum taqwāhum
